db:abstract.db:para: Provides positioning information on Apple platforms.

db:section.db:title: Overview
db:section.db:para: The plugin wraps iOS and macOS positioning subsystems. It is only available on Apple platforms that support corelocation. The plugin provides only positioning information.
This plugin can be loaded by using the provider name corelocation.

db:td.db:para: Ask permissions for using location not only while using the application, but also in background. The parameter is a bool, so it accepts either true or false. If the parameter is not specified, it is considered to be false.

db:section.db:para: On iOS, the application can ask for two levels of location permissions:

db:listitem.db:para: When In Use - makes location updates available only when someone uses your app.
Always - makes location updates available at any time, and lets the system launch your app quietly to handle some updates.

db:section.db:para: By default, only the When In Use permission is requested. The RequestAlwaysPermission parameter is used to explicitly reqeust for Always permission.
